summary: The implementation covers all five requirements with reasonable fidelity. The backend actor (REQ-1) stores presets with material type, name, parameters, and timestamp. The frontend provides a Texture Generator page with 8 material categories, parameter sliders, and a 3D sphere preview with OrbitControls (REQ-2). Export panel generates and downloads Albedo, Normal, Roughness, and Metalness PNG maps at 512x512 (REQ-3). A Presets Library with save dialog, load, and delete is implemented and connected to the backend (REQ-4). A dark industrial theme with amber accents, monospace typography, and panel-based layout is applied throughout (REQ-5). One minor gap is that ceramic and concrete material types are frontend-only extended types and cannot be persisted as backend presets with their own MaterialType variant.

hallucinated_features.description: Export All Maps button that downloads all four texture maps at once in a single action
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request only asked for individual export buttons per map type. A bulk Export All feature was added that was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: getPresetsByMaterialType query and corresponding backend call for filtering presets by material
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request only required save, retrieve all, and delete preset operations. Filtering by material type was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Randomize texture parameters button in the viewport toolbar
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request did not specify a randomize or shuffle feature for texture parameters.

hallucinated_features.description: Collapsible left and right panels with toggle chevron buttons
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request specified a panel-based layout but did not request collapsible or toggleable panels.

hallucinated_features.description: User profile setup onboarding flow with name entry page
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request did not mention user profiles or a profile setup step as part of the application.
